Get effort

Source: R/get_effort.R
get_effort.Rd

Function to get the effort (deployment duration) per deployment.

get_effort(datapkg, ..., unit = NULL)

Arguments

datapkg

a camera trap data package object, as returned by read_camtrap_dp(), i.e. a list containing three data.frames:

  1. observations

  2. deployments

  3. multimedia

and a list with metadata: datapackage
...

filter predicates
unit

time unit to use while returning deployment effort (duration). One of:

  • second

  • minute

  • hour

  • day

  • month

  • year

  • NULL (default) duration objects (e.g. 2594308s (~4.29 weeks))

Value

a tibble (data.frame) with the following columns:

  • deployment_id deployment unique identifier

  • effort: a duration object (duration is a class from lubridate package)

See also

Other get_functions: filter_predicate

Examples

# efforts expressed as Durations
get_effort(camtrapdp)

#> # A tibble: 4 × 3
#>   deployment_id                        effort                 effort_unit
#>   <chr>                                <Duration>             <chr>      
#> 1 3b94f935-020f-49d8-bd59-1736f8a266c4 2594308s (~4.29 weeks) Duration   
#> 2 6b1199ac-e6e4-4eb4-a625-6ee8f9db09f1 1823035s (~3.01 weeks) Duration   
#> 3 9e84c750-e8fa-4502-ae12-cc6c75532f5a 274938s (~3.18 days)   Duration   
#> 4 fff2f46e-8163-453c-9044-61fb77587f5d 356509s (~4.13 days)   Duration   

# effort expressed as days
get_effort(camtrapdp, unit = "day")

#> # A tibble: 4 × 3
#>   deployment_id                        effort effort_unit
#>   <chr>                                 <dbl> <chr>      
#> 1 3b94f935-020f-49d8-bd59-1736f8a266c4  30.0  day        
#> 2 6b1199ac-e6e4-4eb4-a625-6ee8f9db09f1  21.1  day        
#> 3 9e84c750-e8fa-4502-ae12-cc6c75532f5a   3.18 day        
#> 4 fff2f46e-8163-453c-9044-61fb77587f5d   4.13 day
